title: One to go! Need Evers SC460-42 to complete the subset!
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: One to go! Need Evers SC460-42 to complete the subset!
posts.post_content:
A few of these are on the tougher side... just need [STRIKE]seven[/STRIKE] one to complete the subset.  Condition doesn't matter much... prefer cards that are around a 2 if graded.  Thanks in advance.

[STRIKE]Red Ames (Hands Above Head)*[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Frank Baker[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Hal Chase (Blue Portrait)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Patsy Dougherty (Arm In Air)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Larry Doyle (With Bat)*[/STRIKE]
Johnny Evers (Chicago On Shirt, Yellow Sky)
[STRIKE]Fred Snodgrass (Catching)*[/STRIKE]

thanks to Scott for the Snodgrass trade; still looking for six more.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sc460-42/25407/snodgrass-fred-catching[/IMG]
I don't have any of those on your list but WOW that's quite a feat! Best of luck with the last 6.

thanks to Robert for the Ames trade; now need just five more.  Any help is appreciated.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sc460-42/26148/ames-red-hands-above-head[/IMG]

wow... two in one week; just picked up the Chase on eBay which was surprisingly difficult to find.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sc460-42/27532/chase-hal-portrait-blue-background[/IMG]
motivated to buy/trade for the last four...

Picked up the Baker... just need three more and pretty motivated to get them.  I have lots to trade....

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sc460-42/27773/baker-home-run[/IMG]

thanks to Andrew for the Doyle... just two left!

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sc460-42/27941/doyle-larry-with-bat[/IMG]
I just need two more cards to finish the subset... I have lots to trade and will make you a great offer!
monthly bump... help me out if you can.   Looking for lower condition raw or graded, but at this point may make an exception.
Won this on eBay last night.  A little nicer than I wanted, but I can downgrade later.
I won't be at the national, but if anyone sees an Evers SC460-42 give me a shout!
still looking; surprisingly tough to find.
